responsibilities: Conduct development and research on cutting-edge computer vision (CV), natural language processing (NLP), multi-modality, large language models (LLM), and generative modeling.
Follow state-of-the-art (SoTA) progress in relevant fields and transform ideas into production.
Manage life-cycle model development, including model training, deployment, maintenance, and application in business scenarios.
qualifications: Expertise in computer vision (CV) and natural language processing (NLP).
Proficiency in multi-modality and large language models (LLM).
Ability to follow and implement state-of-the-art (SoTA) advancements.
Skills in model training, deployment, and maintenance.
analysis: The job responsibilities include conducting development and research on large language models (LLM) and generative modeling, which directly indicates involvement with language models and generative AI. Additionally, the responsibilities mention managing the life-cycle of model development, which includes model training, deployment, and maintenance, further suggesting work with AI models. The skills required for the job include proficiency in large language models (LLM) and experience with generative modeling, both of which are key components of working with generative AI and language models. The emphasis on state-of-the-art advancements and multi-modality also aligns with the latest trends in AI, particularly in the context of generative AI and LLMs.
